record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:45 A.M. TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:04 p.m., adjourned until Friday, June 29, 2007, at 9:45 a.m.
